name: spfx-test-agent
description: An agentic workflow extension that automates unit test creation for SharePoint Framework projects

chatParticipants.name: spfx-tester
chatParticipants.description: Automated test generation agent for SharePoint Framework projects with self-healing capabilities

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate and heal unit tests for an SPFx component

commands.name: generate-all
commands.description: Generate tests for all TypeScript/TSX files in the workspace

spfx-tester.maxHealingAttempts.description: Maximum number of attempts to heal a failing test

spfx-tester.initialBackoffMs.description: Initial backoff time in milliseconds between retry attempts

spfx-tester.maxRateLimitRetries.description: Maximum number of retries when rate limit is hit

spfx-tester.maxTokensPerError.description: Maximum number of characters to send from error output to LLM

spfx-tester.testFilePattern.description: Pattern for generated test file names. Use ${fileName} and ${ext} as placeholders

spfx-tester.jestCommand.description: Command to execute Jest (e.g., 'npx jest', 'yarn jest', 'pnpm jest')

spfx-tester.llmProvider.description: LLM provider to use for code generation

spfx-tester.llmFamily.description: LLM model family (e.g., 'gpt-4', 'gpt-3.5-turbo'). Leave empty to use user's currently selected model.

spfx-tester.enableTelemetry.description: Enable anonymous telemetry to help improve the extension

spfx-tester.logLevel.description: Minimum log level to display in the output channel
